text: RT @chitribopinions: National political conventions long ago lost the vital purpose they used to serve. text: The U.S. Postal Service says it lost $2.2 billion in the three months that ended in June as the beleaguered agency ‚Äî hit hard by the coronavirus pandemic ‚Äî piles up financial losses that officials warn could top $20 billion over two years. https://t.co/6VGdDAb2NL
